alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 9:42PM CDT until July 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN YORK AND NORTHEASTERN FILLMORE COUNTIES... At 941 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles west of Beaver Crossing, or 11 miles southeast of York, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. In the last several minutes there have been several reports of damaging winds and hail to at least quarter size in the Waco area. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Exeter. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 358 and 365. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
